description: Indulge in the remarkable experience afforded by top-fermented Bernard India Pale Ale. You will be seduced by the distinct aroma, which is characterised by smooth and fresh, fruity tones that contrast perfectly with the stringent bitterness and high alcohol content (5.6) characteristic for this ale. Once you experience IPA with all your senses, you will be won over.

Spice up your day with top fermented special beer Bernard Bohemian Ale. The beer is bottle conditioned. Despite its 8.2  alcohol has a fresh fruity scent, clean malty flavor with a pinch of spicy coriander and subtle warmth in the aftertaste.

The Celebration lager with a fine yeast culture is an unpasteurized beer with distinctive flavor, fine yeast taste and aroma. The beer is secondary fermented in bottle so there can be a yeasty sediment on the bottom of the bottle, and the beer can be slightly cloudy during the consumation.
A non-filtered pungent lager with a fine yeast culture is an unpasteurized beer with its bitterness in harmony with a fine caramel aroma and tasty fullness.

This non-filtered dark lager with a fine yeast culture is an unpasteurized beer brewed from four types of malt, with a distinctive full taste and a fine bitterness. Its special flavour makes it unique on the Czech beer market.

Gluten-free lager is intended for celiaks or person suffering from celiac disease or gluten-free diet due to the gluten content of up to 20 mg/kg. It will captivate you with traditional flavors, which is characterized by its delicate richness, balanced bitterness and delicate hop aroma and a thick and rich foam.

A non-alcoholic light beer produced using the traditional brewing procedure with pasteurization, preserving its original beer taste, colour and brewing aroma. The beer is pleasantly bitter with rich foam.

This non-alcoholic semi-dark beer is produced using the original brewing procedure with pasteurization and has an amber colour and combines the harmony of a sweet caramel aroma with a pleasant bitter taste.
A refreshing non-alcoholic plum beverage is produced using the original brewing procedure from the first-class ingredients and natural plum sauce and aroma.
A refreshing non-alcoholic sour cherry beverage is produced using the original brewing procedure from the first-class ingredients and natural sour cherry sauce and aroma.

Light beer Bernard with fine yeast brings you full and delicious yeast taste. This beer is characterized by pleasant bitterness, distinct pungency, with fine hop aroma and rich foam. There can be a yeasty sediment so that the beer can be slightly cloudy the consumation.

Light lager Bernard with fine yeast brings you delicate hop fragrance, full and delicious yeast taste and refreshing high bite. You can enjoy it at any occasion at home or with friends. There can be a yeasty sediment so that the beer can be slightly cloudy the consumation.
An unpasteurized light tap beer with a pleasing bitterness, distinct pungency, with hop aroma and rich foam.
This unpasteurized light lager is a beer with a balanced bitter taste in harmony with its tasty fullness, hop aroma and rich foam.
This unpasteurized light lager is a beer with a balanced bitter taste in harmony with its tasty fullness, hop aroma and rich foam.

Budvar 33 is bitter. And we gave him a name accordingly. It has exactly 33 units of bitterness, mainly thanks to the Czech hop Agnus, which belongs to one of the most bitter varieties ever. 33 is also interesting with Crystal Light malt, which is used mainly in top-fermented beers. Thanks to the fact that we were not afraid to add it to a typical Czech lager, our beer acquired an interesting color and smooth smoothness.
Lettuce hops, water from 300m deep artesian wells, Moravian malt, the art of brewers and a long maturation period in lager cellars. Lager that makes a good name for Czech beer all over the world.
Lettuce hops, water from 300m deep artesian wells, Moravian malt, the art of brewers and a long maturation period in lager cellars. Lager that makes a good name for Czech beer all over the world.
Traditional Czech draft beer brewed from Satu Mare hops.
Dark lager with a strong, slightly bitter taste with undertones of coffee.
The taste of honest lager from Budějovice without alcohol.
Strong beer of golden color and strong malty taste. It matures in our lager cellars for at least 200 days.

The beer is named after Tas Černohorský of Boskovice, who together with his brother Jaroslav owned a brewery on the estate of Montenegro in the first half of the 16th century. This is a typical Czech beer characterized by a balanced taste and excellent foamability. Good cut and fullness encourage another sip. After drinking, it leaves a feeling of pleasant, gradually disappearing bitterness without a rough and astringent breath.

The cellar is a beer with a more pronounced hop bitterness and higher fullness. Before rolling into packaging, it is not filtered and does not get rid of yeast, which gives the beer an unmistakable taste, aroma and, most importantly, appearance. The color of the beer is golden yellow to golden brown. Good cut and fullness encourage further drinking.

This beer is named after Father Vincenc Ševčík, one of the founders of the Rolnická akciová společnost pivovarní a sladovní v Černá Hora in 1896. It is very popular for its quality taste and taste balance. Good cut and fullness encourage further drinking. It has a delicate, balanced hop bitterness, leaving a pleasant, slowly fading bitterness after drinking without a rough and astringent tinge.

Černohorský Ležák is made from the highest quality raw materials according to one of the oldest recipes in Moravia. It is characterized by a full 'bready' taste with a higher hop bitterness, which disappears smoothly after drinking. The color changes from golden yellow to a hint of golden brown.

Traditional Montenegrin beer, which is made from four types of malt. As the name of this beer suggests, it is characterized by a garnet to reddish-brown color with good foaming and aftertaste. It excels in high fullness and higher sweetness. The use of Bavarian, caramel and coloring malt according to ancient recipes gives this beer an unmistakable caramel to sweet taste with slightly pronounced bitterness.

This special is characterized by good frothiness, golden brown color, good aftertaste and fullness, ie properties that correspond to the character of Czech medium-fermented beers. Its taste combines a smooth balanced bitterness with a delicate, slightly sweet honey flavor.

category: Beer full of light wheat, top fermented, unfiltered
description: Velen beer is produced using special top-fermenting yeasts, which achieves a unique harmony of taste, in which sweet and fruity tones predominate. At least one half of the malt is made from wheat. The result is an opaque, light to straw-colored beer that smells like yeast, fruit and spices. It has a rich foam and a strong cut.

Light lager, which excels in full bitter taste and strong hop aroma. Beer is produced using traditional technology, typical of Czech beers. It ferments in open cellars and matures at low temperatures in lager cellars.

Light draft beer characterized by intense bitterness, golden color, thick white foam and a strong full taste. It is brewed in the traditional way, typical of Czech beers, where it is fermented in open cellars, matured at low temperatures in lager cellars.
Light draft beer with more pronounced bitterness, which is balanced by a fresh hop aroma and fuller taste. Beer matures at low temperatures in lager cellars.

Dark lager is characterized by a thick foam, sweet taste, mild bitterness and deep black color. The beer is brewed using a traditional technological process, where it is fermented in open cellars and matured at low temperatures in lager cellars. For several years in a row, Rebel Černý has regularly been at the forefront of tasting competitions not only in the Czech Republic but also abroad.

Light non-alcoholic beer is characterized by its golden color, rich foam, strong bitterness and fresh hop aroma. When brewing this beer, a balanced combination of light and Bavarian malt with the highest quality varieties of Satu Mare hops is used.

IPA is a top-fermented semi-dark beer. Its uniqueness lies in the intense bitterness, copper color and slightly fruity and hop taste. It is cooked from five types of malt and four types of hops. When fermenting in lager tanks, the 'dry hopping' or 'cold hops' method is used, in which special aromatic hops are added.

Top-fermented wheat beer is characterized by a light to straw color with high saturation and rich foam. Rebel Wheat has a strong intense taste of fruit with hints of vanilla, banana and spices. This sharp and refreshing beer is suitable for refreshment not only on hot summer days, but also a pleasant variety for those who like to discover non-traditional and interesting tastes.

Strong beer characterized by thick white foam, higher bitterness and harmonious full taste. Beer is brewed from Czech malts in the traditional two-mouth method. It differs from other beers by its spicy to citrus aroma from the added specially bred variety of wild Caucasian hops.

Refreshing light beer drink with fruit flavor of grapefruit and lemon. It is made from purely natural raw materials and does not contain any preservatives or dyes. Low-alcohol drink ideal for hot summer days, leisure or sports activities.

Dark lager, which is characterized by a deep black color, a distinctive cherry taste and aroma of cherry seeds. The beer consists of dark Rebel beer, a natural fruity aroma without artificial colors and sweeteners.

Light lager, which excels in a pleasant hop and malt aroma. The beer is brewed using traditional technology, fermented in open cellars and matured at low temperatures in lager cellars. It is an ideal choice for those who appreciate its fullness, strong cut and rich foam.
Light non-alcoholic beer is characterized by medium bitterness, rich foam and balanced hop taste. In its production, the highest quality varieties of Satu Mare hops are used. Suitable for drivers.

A light and refreshing citrus-flavored beer drink without artificial colors. The rebel combines an unusual combination of sour lemon and bitter grapefruit. Thanks to its low alcohol content, it is a great refreshment on hot summer days.

Light lager with thick, creamy foam, medium fullness and balanced bitterness. It is made from the highest quality raw materials and matures in lager cellars at low temperatures. It is brewed with traditional technology, typical of Czech beers, which gives it an unmistakable and rich taste.

Just as the hedgehog is a symbol of the silver city of Jihlava, so the Ježek 11 lager is a representative of taste and the 'family silver' of the Jihlava Brewery. This lager is characterized by a balanced full taste and pronounced bitterness, complemented by an exceptional hop aroma of delicate Satu Mare varieties. It has a golden color and a perfect cut.
Ježek 10 Šenkové is an honest ten of Czech malt and Satu Mare hops, which is characterized by a balanced taste, good bitterness and excellent drinkability. It has a golden color and quality rind.
